transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello ji sir good afternoon sir.
Executive: Good afternoon madam boliye.
Customer: Sir main India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Haan haan boliye madam.
Customer: Ji ji ji sir abhi aapne call kiya tha main usko dekha nahi to fir maine call back kiya ji.
Executive: Haan main bol raha tha ho gaya wo update acche se.
Customer: Haan wo to sir abhi verification hoga.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To aapke paas bhi calls aayegi.
Executive: Abhi abhi abhi gaya.
Customer: Nahi wo ab dekhiye production team kab karti hai aaj karti hai karti hai ya fir karti hai.
Executive: 3 baje ke aage karo madam.
Customer: 3 baje sir nahi wo main nahi karungi wo main nahi karungi sir wo production team karegi.
Executive: Accha aapke product vagera jo bhi cheeze hongi na wo karegi meri side se nahi hoga sir jab aapka TrustSeal live ho jayega uske baad se fir main handle karungi fir jo cheeze aapko chahiye.
Executive: Wo kya kya puchenge madam.
Customer: Jyada kuch nahi puchenge bas yahi jaise ek video video KYC hota hai to theek hai aap camera off rakhenge samne bataya tha mujhe to aap camera off rakhiyega.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Bas wo jo cheeze requirement hogi jaise company ka banner banner vagera to hoga na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Company ka koi banner hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aisa kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi fir aapko GST vagera theek hai koi baat nahi aapke GST vagera kuch bhi jo bhi dikhana hoga aap apni site se wahi karwa dijiyega aap apne according jo bhi wo mange jo available hoga baki cheeze bol dijiyega ki available nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Bas bas wo itni karenge aapko normal madam 3 baje ke aage call kijiyega.
Executive: Haan wo aapke paas call aayegi jab sir to aap jo time denge wo usi time pe call karenge aapko aapke according aap chinta mat kariye wo aapke according hi call karega jaise aap se hum time mangte hai aap jab bhi free rahenge aap uske according us time pe aap unko bol dijiyega.
Executive: Accha to wo call hone ke baad me turant live ho jayega kya.
Customer: Haan fir uske baad sir obviously hota hai to thoda verification process hota hai wo bhi wo bhi ho jayega uske baad sir 6 se 7 din lagta hai sir fir aapka TrustSeal ki hard copy banegi soft copy chaliye theek hai aapko hard copy nahi lenge soft copy banegi fir aapka pura jo catalog hai wo design hoga apne according plus aapke profile me TrustSeal ka logo lagega to usme sir kam se kam 6 se 7 din lagta hai kyuki sir ye abhi normal normal sa tha aapka profile se registered tha ab wo thoda premium ho raha hai iske liye thoda sa time lagega.
Executive: Ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai madam aur lead vagera sir sahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi abhi tak maine dekha nahi thoda morning se dekha sirf.
Executive: Accha aur calling call aayi kya sir uske to aap chinta mat kariye wo to waise bhi badh jayega inquiry sir is mahine aapke paas 93 aayi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir convert hota hai to aap wo aapki rating bahut kharab chal rahi hai sir.
Customer: Kyun.
Executive: Itni kharab rating kyun chal rahi hai aapki 3.8 ki rating hai aapki.
Customer: Abhi wo nahi pata madam mujhe wo kaise badhti hai to.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir ye bataiye koi bhi deal convert hoti hai to aap sir review ke liye bolte hai ya nahi bolte aap.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Nahi review ke liye nahi bolte.
Executive: Ji sir.
Executive: Nahi review ke liye nahi bolte madam.
Executive: Sir bol diya kariye aapki company ka jitni rating hogi utni upar dikhegi aapki company.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Ji TrustSeal me bhi sir man lijiye TrustSeal me paanch log hai theek hai lekin jo jo jyada jyada jyada rating reviews hoga call ka response rate hoga wo jyada jyada us company wo company jo hai na sir wo wo us company us company ko sabse upar dikhayega TrustSeal me paanch log hai to kaun upar dikhega pehle number pe dusre number pe teesre number pe chauthe number pe paanchve number pe to apne according dikhega.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Theek hai na fir hum customer se baat karenge review ke liye.
Executive: Haan to kahan se dena ye pata hai aapko.
Executive: Kahan kahan karna hai kahan se dena hai aapko review ke liye aapko pata hai.
Executive: Puchna madam aap kafi karke dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir bas step main batati hoon jaise lead manager hai na phone pe ya fir phone pe use karte hai ya fir laptop pe kaise.
Customer: Phone pe phone pe.
Executive: Man lijiye ki koi bhi customer hai lead manager pe jaiye koi bhi customer hai kisi bhi customer ka aap chat open kariye upar three line bana hoga three line ya three dot us pe click karenge to ask for review aayega abhi bhi dekh sakte hai aap on call bhi check kar sakte hai.
Customer: Haan wo pata hai madam mujhe.
Executive: Wahi se unko bhej dijiye wahi se aap unko whatsapp pe bhi bhej sakte hai ho jayega haan theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai whatsapp whatsapp pe bhej denge wo bhi ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai aur sir bataiye uske alawa aur koi dikkat.
Customer: Nahi baki to kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about TrustSeal verification process.

- Rating is low, wants to know how to improve.



Resolution:

- Explained TrustSeal verification process.

- Explained how to ask for review.

- Explained how ratings affect visibility.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will ask for reviews.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, verification, rating, reviews, lead manager
